mapper.sql: id, question, answer, user, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from week_question order by id desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into week_question
id,
question,
answer,
user,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update week_question
question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update week_question set question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
